paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR gene variants, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Cardiac amyloidosis with symptoms of heart failure.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient presented with breathlessness, general tiredness and orthopnea.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with increased amyloidogenic potential.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families with a history of cardiac amyloidosis.
variants.population_frequency: Variant found in 1% of African American population in gnomAD.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on family segregation and functional studies.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is common in familial cases of amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Patients with familial ATTR tend to express a phenotype specific to their particular mutation.
The condition was formerly known as senile systemic amyloidosis.

tables_processed.table_caption: Most Common Forms of Cardiac Amyloidosis

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding TTR variants and penetrance were successfully extracted.
